tasks.mutation: mutation{ resource { address { Create( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, subject: { id: "", scope: "", roleAssociations: [], hierarchicalScopes: [], unauthenticated: true, token: "" } } ) { status { key code message } } } }}

mutation{ resource { contact_point_type { Create( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, subject: { id: "", scope: "", roleAssociations: [], hierarchicalScopes: [], unauthenticated: true, token: "" } } ) { status { key code message } } } }}

mutation{ resource { contact_point { Create( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, subject: { id: "", scope: "", roleAssociations: [], hierarchicalScopes: [], unauthenticated: true, token: "" } } ) { status { key code message } } } }}

mutation createOrganizations($var: [IIoRestorecommerceOrganizationOrganization!]!){ resource { organization { Create( input: { items: $var, totalCount: 0, subject: { id: "", scope: "", roleAssociations: [], hierarchicalScopes: [], unauthenticated: true, token: "" } } ) { status { key code message } } } }}
